tgt_original: dvayorapi ca tau śukraśoṇitabindū mātureva yonau miśrībhūtau śaraṃ baddhā tiṣṭhata ekapiṇḍībhūtau tadyathā pakkaṃ payaḥ śītabhāvamāpadyamānaṃ
tannirodhasamakālaṃ ca tasyaiva sarvabījakasya sāmarthyāttadanyasūkṣmendriya mahābhūtavyatimiśro'  nyastatsabhāgaḥ śukraśoṇitapiṇḍo jāyate sendriyaḥ |
sācāsau kalalāvasthā tāni ca tasya kalasyendriyamahābhūtāni kāyendriyeṇaiva sahotpadyante |
